<title level="1" right="Rules">[Hit Points (HP)](/Rules.aspx?ID=3299)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
[Hit Points](/Rules.aspx?ID=2320) represent the amount of punishment a creature can take before it falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95) and begins [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=69). Damage decreases Hit Points on a 1-to-1 basis, while healing restores Hit Points at the same rate.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
